episode.titlePG: ThinkCon 2012 Panel Session - From the newstands to Twitter
episode.shortdescPG: Jane Gregory, Martin Robins and John Naughton come together for an hour session answering questions on the future of science communication.
episode.longdescPG: Jane Gregory, Martin Robins and John Naughton come together for an hour session answering questions on the future of science communication.
episode.keywordsPG: THINKCON, science, twitter, communication, journalist, future
